   20: -module(shell_docs_markdown_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% callbacks
   23: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: %% test format
   26: -export([convert_erlang_html/1, convert_unknown_format/1]).
   27: 
   28: %% test non-existing moduledoc
   29: -export([non_existing_moduledoc/1,hidden_moduledoc/1,existing_moduledoc/1]).
   30: 
   31: %% test non-existing docs
   32: -export([non_existing_doc/1, hidden_doc/1, existing_doc/1]).
   33: 
   34: %% headings
   35: -export([h1_test/1, h2_test/1, h3_test/1, h4_test/1, h5_test/1, h6_test/1,
   36:          setext_h1/1, setext_h2/1]).
   37: 
   38: %% quotes
   39: -export([single_line_quote_test/1, double_char_for_quote_test/1,
   40:          ignore_three_spaces_before_quote/1, multiple_line_quote_test/1,
   41:          paragraph_in_between_test/1, quote_with_anchor_test/1, quote_without_space/1]).
   42: 
   43: %% paragraph
   44: -export([paragraph_after_heading_test/1, quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test/1]).
   45: 
   46: %% inline code
   47: -export([single_line_code_test/1, multiple_line_code_test/1, paragraph_between_code_test/1]).
   48: 
   49: %% fence code
   50: -export([single_line_fence_code_test/1, multiple_line_fence_code_test/1,
   51:          paragraph_between_fence_code_test/1, fence_code_ignores_link_format_test/1,
   52:          fence_code_with_spaces/1]).
   53: 
   54: %% br
   55: -export([start_with_br_test/1, multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test/1,
   56:          multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test/1, ending_br_test/1]).
   57: 
   58: %% Comments
   59: -export([begin_comment_test/1, after_paragraph_comment/1, forget_closing_comment/1 ]).
   60: 
   61: %% Format
   62: -export([format_heading_test/1, format_paragraph_test/1, format_multiple_inline/1,
   63:          format_multiple_inline_format_short/1, format_multiple_inline_format_long/1,
   64:          format_multiple_inline_format_mixed/1, unmatched_format_simple/1,
   65:          unmatched_format_with_inline/1, unmatched_complex_format_with_inline/1,
   66:          format_inline_link_with_inline/1, complex_inline_format/1, skip_symbols_in_inline/1,
   67:          format_header_identifier/1, italic_in_middle_word_test/1, italic_with_colons/1,
   68:          list_format_with_italics_in_sentence/1, list_format_with_bold_in_sentence/1,
   69:          new_lines_test/1, format_separator_test/1, list_with_format/1, multi_word_format_test/1,
   70:          multiline_link/1, multiline_link_not_allowed/1, inline_mfa_link/1,
   71:          escaped_character/1]).
   72: 
   73: %% Bullet lists
   74: -export([singleton_bullet_list/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_with_format/1,
   75:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1,
   76:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph3/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list2/1,
   77:          multiline_bullet_list/1, even_nested_bullet_list/1, odd_nested_bullet_list/1,
   78:          complex_nested_bullet_list/1, complex_nested_bullet_list2/1, complex_nested_bullet_list3/1,
   79:          bullet_list_mix_with_number_list/1, inline_code_list/1, bullet_list_with_anchor/1]).
   80: 
   81: %% Numbered lists
   82: -export([singleton_numbered_list/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph/1,
   83:          singleton_numbered_list_with_format/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1,
   84:          singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1, multiline_numbered_indented_list/1,
   85:          multiline_numbered_indented_list2/1, multiline_numbered_list/1, even_nested_numbered_list/1,
   86:          odd_nested_numbered_list/1]).
   87: 
   88: -export([table_with_rows/1, table_with_escaped_bars/1, fake_table_test/1]).
   89: 
   90: -define(ERLANG_HTML, ~"application/erlang+html").
   91: 
   92: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   93: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   94: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   95: 
   96: 
   97: -define(EXPECTED_FUN(Expected), {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Expected, #{}}).
   98: 
   99: all() ->
  100:     [{group, different_format_generator},
  101:      {group, module_generator},
  102:      {group, doc_generator},
  103:      {group, header_generator},
  104:      {group, quote_generator},
  105:      {group, paragraph_generator},
  106:      {group, code_generator},
  107:      {group, fence_code_generator},
  108:      {group, br_generator},
  109:      {group, comment_generator},
  110:      {group, format_generator},
  111:      {group, bullet_list_generator},
  112:      {group, numbered_list_generator},
  113:      {group, table_generator}
  114:     ].
  115: 
  116: groups() ->
  117:     [{different_format_generator, [sequence], different_format_conversion_tests()},
  118:      {module_generator, [sequence], moduledoc_tests()},
  119:      {doc_generator, [sequence], doc_tests()},
  120:      {header_generator, [sequence], header_tests()},
  121:      {quote_generator, [sequence], quote_tests()},
  122:      {paragraph_generator, [sequence], paragraph_tests()},
  123:      {code_generator, [sequence], code_tests()},
  124:      {fence_code_generator, [sequence], fence_code_tests()},
  125:      {br_generator, [sequence], br_tests()},
  126:      {comment_generator, [sequence], comment_tests()},
  127:      {format_generator, [sequence], format_tests()},
  128:      {bullet_list_generator, [sequence], bullet_list_tests()},
  129:      {numbered_list_generator, [sequence], numbered_list_tests()},
  130:      {table_generator, [sequence], table_tests()}
  131:     ].
  132: 
  133: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  134:     Config.
  135: 
  136: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: different_format_conversion_tests() ->
  140:     [ convert_erlang_html,
  141:       convert_unknown_format
  142:     ].
  143: 
  144: moduledoc_tests() ->
  145:     [ non_existing_moduledoc,
  146:       hidden_moduledoc,
  147:       existing_moduledoc
  148:     ].
  149: 
  150: doc_tests() ->
  151:     [ non_existing_doc,
  152:       hidden_doc,
  153:       existing_doc
  154:     ].
  155: 
  156: header_tests() ->
  157:     [ h1_test,
  158:       h2_test,
  159:       h3_test,
  160:       h4_test,
  161:       h5_test,
  162:       h6_test,
  163:       setext_h1,
  164:       setext_h2
  165:     ].
  166: 
  167: quote_tests() ->
  168:     [ single_line_quote_test,
  169:       double_char_for_quote_test,
  170:       ignore_three_spaces_before_quote,
  171:       multiple_line_quote_test,
  172:       paragraph_in_between_test,
  173:       quote_with_anchor_test,
  174:       quote_without_space
  175:     ].
  176: 
  177: paragraph_tests() ->
  178:     [ paragraph_after_heading_test,
  179:       quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test
  180:     ].
  181: 
  182: code_tests() ->
  183:     [ single_line_code_test,
  184:       multiple_line_code_test,
  185:       paragraph_between_code_test
  186:     ].
  187: 
  188: fence_code_tests() ->
  189:   [single_line_fence_code_test,
  190:    multiple_line_fence_code_test,
  191:    paragraph_between_fence_code_test,
  192:    fence_code_ignores_link_format_test,
  193:    fence_code_with_spaces
  194:   ].
  195: 
  196: br_tests() ->
  197:     [ start_with_br_test,
  198:       multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test,
  199:       multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test,
  200:       ending_br_test
  201:     ].
  202: 
  203: comment_tests() ->
  204:     [ begin_comment_test,
  205:       after_paragraph_comment,
  206:       forget_closing_comment
  207:     ].
  208: 
  209: format_tests() ->
  210:     [ format_heading_test,
  211:       format_paragraph_test,
  212:       format_multiple_inline,
  213:       format_multiple_inline_format_long,
  214:       format_multiple_inline_format_short,
  215:       format_multiple_inline_format_mixed,
  216:       unmatched_format_simple,
  217:       unmatched_format_with_inline,
  218:       unmatched_complex_format_with_inline,
  219:       format_inline_link_with_inline,
  220:       complex_inline_format,
  221:       skip_symbols_in_inline,
  222:       format_header_identifier,
  223:       italic_in_middle_word_test,
  224:       italic_with_colons,
  225:       list_format_with_italics_in_sentence,
  226:       list_format_with_bold_in_sentence,
  227:       new_lines_test,
  228:       format_separator_test,
  229:       list_with_format,
  230:       multi_word_format_test,
  231:       multiline_link,
  232:       multiline_link_not_allowed,
  233:       inline_mfa_link,
  234:       escaped_character
  235:     ].
  236: 
  237: bullet_list_tests() ->
  238:     [ singleton_bullet_list,
  239:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  240:       singleton_bullet_list_with_format,
  241:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  242:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  243:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph3,
  244:       multiline_bullet_indented_list,
  245:       multiline_bullet_indented_list2,
  246:       multiline_bullet_list,
  247:       even_nested_bullet_list,
  248:       odd_nested_bullet_list,
  249:       complex_nested_bullet_list,
  250:       complex_nested_bullet_list2,
  251:       complex_nested_bullet_list3,
  252:       bullet_list_mix_with_number_list,
  253:       inline_code_list,
  254:       bullet_list_with_anchor
  255:     ].
  256: 
  257: numbered_list_tests() ->
  258:     [ singleton_numbered_list,
  259:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  260:       singleton_numbered_list_with_format,
  261:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  262:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  263:       multiline_numbered_indented_list,
  264:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2,
  265:       multiline_numbered_list,
  266:       even_nested_numbered_list,
  267:       odd_nested_numbered_list
  268:     ].
  269: 
  270: table_tests() ->
  271:   [ table_with_rows,
  272:     table_with_escaped_bars,
  273:     fake_table_test].
  274: 
  275: convert_erlang_html(_Conf) ->
  276:     Doc = #{~"en" => [{p, [], [~"Test"]}]},
  277:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}}],
  278: 
  279:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ?ERLANG_HTML, none, #{}, Functions),
  280:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  281:     ok.
  282: 
  283: convert_unknown_format(_Conf) ->
  284:     Doc = #{~"en" => ~"<text>Here</text>"},
  285:     Functions = create_fun(Doc),
  286: 
  287:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"xml", Doc, #{},Functions),
  288:     ok = try
  289:            shell_docs:validate(Docs)
  290:          catch
  291:            error:function_clause ->
  292:              ok
  293:          end,
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: non_existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  297:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", none, #{}, []),
  298:     _ = compile(Docs),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: hidden_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  302:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", hidden, #{}, []),
  303:     _ = compile(Docs),
  304:     ok.
  305: 
  306: existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  307:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here"),
  308:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  309:     #{~"en" := HtmlModDoc} = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  310:     H1 = header(1, ~"Here"),
  311:     [H1] = HtmlModDoc,
  312:     ok.
  313: 
  314: non_existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  315:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", none, #{}, create_fun(none)),
  316:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  317:     ok.
  318: 
  319: hidden_doc(_Conf) ->
  320:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", none, #{}, create_fun(hidden)),
  321:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  325:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"Test"),
  326:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  327:     ok.
  328: 
  329: h1_test(_Conf) ->
  330:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here"),
  331:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  332: 
  333:     Expected = #{~"en" => [header(1, ~"Here")]},
  334:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  335:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  336:     ok.
  337: 
  338: h2_test(_Conf) ->
  339:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here\n## Header 2"),
  340:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  341: 
  342:     Expected = #{~"en" => [{h1, [], [~"Here"]}, {h2, [], [~"Header 2"]}]},
  343:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  344:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  345:     ok.
  346: 
  347: h3_test(_Conf) ->
  348:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here\n### Header 3"),
  349:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  350: 
  351:     Expected = #{~"en" => [{h1, [], [~"Here"]}, {h3, [], [~"Header 3"]}]},
  352:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  353:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: h4_test(_Conf) ->
  357:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"### Here\n#### Header 4"),
  358:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  359: 
  360:     Expected = #{~"en" => [{h3, [], [~"Here"]}, {h4, [], [~"Header 4"]}]},
  361:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  362:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  363:     ok.
  364: 
  365: h5_test(_Conf) ->
  366:     Convert = fun shell_docs_markdown:parse_md/1,
  367:     Doc = #{~"en" => Convert(~"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5")},
  368:     DocH5 = #{~"en" => Convert(~"##### H5")},
  369:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  370:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH5, #{}}],
  371:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", Doc, #{}, Functions),
  372: 
  373:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  374:     ExpectedH3 = #{~"en" => [ {h3, [], [~"Here"]},
  375:                                  {h4, [], [~"Header 4"]},
  376:                                  {h5, [], [~"H5"]}]},
  377:     ExpectedH5 = #{~"en" => [ {h5, [], [~"H5"]} ]},
  378:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  379:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  380:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  381:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH5, #{}} = E2,
  382:     ok.
  383: 
  384: h6_test(_Conf) ->
  385:     Convert = fun shell_docs_markdown:parse_md/1,
  386:     Doc = #{~"en" => Convert(~"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5")},
  387:     DocH6 = #{~"en" => Convert(~"###### H6\n## H2")},
  388:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  389:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH6, #{}}],
  390:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ~"application/erlang+html", Doc, #{}, Functions),
  391: 
  392:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  393:     ExpectedH3 = #{~"en" => [ {h3, [], [~"Here"]},
  394:                                  {h4, [], [~"Header 4"]},
  395:                                  {h5, [], [~"H5"]}]},
  396:     ExpectedH6 = #{~"en" => [ {h6, [], [~"H6"]},
  397:                                  {h2, [], [~"H2"]} ]},
  398:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  399:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  400:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  401:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH6, #{}} = E2,
  402:     ok.
  403: 
  404: setext_h1(_Config) ->
  405:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"Here\n===\n\nNew text"),
  406:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  407: 
  408:     Expected = expected([ header(1, ~"Here"),
  409:                           p(~"New text")]),
  410:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  411:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  412:     ok.
  413: 
  414: setext_h2(_Config) ->
  415:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"Here\n--\n\nNew text"),
  416:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  417: 
  418:     Expected = expected([ header(2, ~"Here"),
  419:                           p(~"New text")]),
  420:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  421:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  422:     ok.
  423: 
  424: single_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  425:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here\n> This is a quote"),
  426:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  427: 
  428:     Expected = expected([ header(1, ~"Here"),
  429:                           blockquote(p(~"This is a quote"))]),
  430:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  431:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  432:     ok.
  433: 
  434: double_char_for_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  435:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here\n>> This is a quote"),
  436:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  437: 
  438:     Expected = expected([ header(1, ~"Here"),
  439:                           blockquote(p(~"This is a quote"))]),
  440:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  441:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  442:     ok.
  443: 
  444: ignore_three_spaces_before_quote(_Conf) ->
  445:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"   > # Here"),
  446:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  447: 
  448:     Expected = expected(blockquote([header(1, ~"Here")])),
  449:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  450:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  451:     ok.
  452: 
  453: multiple_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  454:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"> # Here\n> This is a quote"),
  455:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  456: 
  457:     Expected = expected([ blockquote([header(1, ~"Here"),
  458:                                       p(~"This is a quote")])]),
  459:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  460:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  461:     ok.
  462: 
  463: paragraph_in_between_test(_Conf) ->
  464:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Header 1\nThis is text\n> A quote\n> continues\n## Header 2\nBody content"),
  465:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  466: 
  467:     Expected = expected([ header(1, ~"Header 1"),
  468:                           p(~"This is text"),
  469:                           blockquote([p(~"A quote continues")]),
  470:                           header(2, ~"Header 2"),
  471:                           p(~"Body content")]),
  472:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  473:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  474:     ok.
  475: 
  476: quote_with_anchor_test(_Config) ->
  477:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  478: ~"> #### Note{: .info }
  479: >
  480: > The [User's Guide](index.html) has examples and a
  481: > [Getting Started](using_ssh.md) section."),
  482:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  483: 
  484:     Expected = expected([blockquote([header(4,~"Note"),
  485:                                      p([~"The User's Guide has examples and a Getting Started section."])])]),
  486:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  487:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  488:     ok.
  489: 
  490: quote_without_space(_Config) ->
  491:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  492: ~"> #### Note{: .info }
  493: >
  494: >The [User's Guide](index.html) has examples and a
  495: > [Getting Started](using_ssh.md) section."),
  496:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  497: 
  498:     Expected = expected([blockquote([header(4,~"Note"),
  499:                                      p([~"The User's Guide has examples and a Getting Started section."])])]),
  500:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  501:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: paragraph_after_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  505:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Header 1\nThis is text\n\nBody content"),
  506:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  507: 
  508:     Expected = #{~"en" =>
  509:                      [ header(1, ~"Header 1"),
  510:                        p(~"This is text"),
  511:                        p(~"Body content")]},
  512:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  513:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  514:     ok.
  515: 
  516: quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  517:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"> Quote 1\nThis is text\n> Quote 2\nBody content"),
  518:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  519: 
  520:     Expected = expected([ blockquote(p(~"Quote 1")),
  521:                           p(~"This is text"),
  522:                           blockquote(p(~"Quote 2")),
  523:                           p(~"Body content")]),
  524:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  525:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  526:     ok.
  527: 
  528: single_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  529:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# Here\n    This is code"),
  530:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  531: 
  532:     Expected = expected([ header(1, ~"Here"),
  533:                           code(~"This is code\n")]),
  534:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  535:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  536:     ok.
  537: 
  538: multiple_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  539:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"    # Here\n    This is code\n        Nested Line"),
  540:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  541: 
  542:     Expected = expected(code(~"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line\n")),
  543:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  544:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: paragraph_between_code_test(_Conf) ->
  548:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a paragraph\n",
  549:                               "\n",
  550:                               "    # Here\n",
  551:                               "    This is code\n",
  552:                               "        Nested Line\n",
  553:                               "Another paragraph">>),
  554:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  555: 
  556:     Expected = expected([ p(~"This is a paragraph"),
  557:                           code(~"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line\n"),
  558:                           p(~"Another paragraph")]),
  559:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  560:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  561:     ok.
  562:

  641: multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  642:   Text = """
  643: Returns a new list `List3`, which is made from the elements of `List1` followed
  644: by the elements of `List2`.
  645: """,
  646:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(list_to_binary(Text)),
  647:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  648:     Expected = expected([p([~"Returns a new list ",
  649:                             inline_code(~"List3"),
  650:                             ~", which is made from the elements of ",
  651:                             inline_code(~"List1"), ~" followed by the elements of ",
  652:                             inline_code(~"List2"), ~"."])]),
  653:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  654:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  655:     ok.

  673: after_paragraph_comment(_Conf) ->
  674:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"Test\n<!-- Ignore -->Test"),

  680: 
  681: forget_closing_comment(_Conf) ->
  682:     ok = try
  683:            create_eep48_doc(~"Test\n<!-- Ignore Test")
  684:          catch
  685:            error:missing_close_comment ->
  686:              ok
  687:          end,
  688:     ok.

  690: format_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  691:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"# **H1**\n## _H2_\n### `H3`"),
  692:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  693:     Expected = expected([ header(1, em(~"H1")),
  694:                           header(2, it(~"H2")),
  695:                           header(3, inline_code(~"H3"))
  696:                         ]),
  697:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  698:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  699:     ok.
  700: 
  701: format_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  702:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"**H1** *HH* _H2_ __H3__ `code`"),
  703:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  704:     Expected = expected([ p([ em(~"H1"),
  705:                               ~" ",
  706:                               it(~"HH"),
  707:                               ~" ",
  708:                               it(~"H2"),
  709:                               ~" ",
  710:                               em(~"H3"),
  711:                               ~" ",
  712:                               inline_code(~"code")
  713:                             ])
  714:                         ]),
  715:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  716:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  717:     ok.
  718: 
  719: format_multiple_inline(_Conf) ->

  723:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  768: unmatched_complex_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->

  770:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  771:     Expected = expected([ p([ ~"__H1 ", it(~"HH"), ~" ", it(~"test"), ~" ",
  772:                               em(~"test2"),
  773:                               ~" ",
  774:                               it(~"there"), ~" "])
  775:                         ]),
  776:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  777:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  778:     ok.

  780: format_inline_link_with_inline(_Config) ->
  781:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"[`splitwith/2`](`splitwith/2`) behaves as if"),
  782:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  783:     Expected = expected([ p([inline_code(~"splitwith/2"),~" behaves as if"])]),
  784:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  785:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  786:     ok.
  787: 
  788: complex_inline_format(_Config) ->
  789:   %% The complexity here comes from the _, where the alg needs to backtrack
  790:   %% add the _ to an existing buffer, and continue where it left off using  %% any previous opening format characters, in this case **.
  791:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"**`{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}`**"),
  792:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  793:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(~"{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}")))),
  794:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  795:   ok.
  796:

  800:   Expected = expected(p(~"this ssh_daemon_channel is not in italics")),

  802:   ok.

  868: %% As per commonmark.js-0.28.1, Github Flavoured Markdown 0.23.10
  869: multiline_link_not_allowed(_Config) ->

  873:   Expected = expected(p([~"this is a [link with new line] (erlang.com)"])),

  877: inline_mfa_link(_Config) ->

  880:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),

  884:                          inline_code(~"extra:here/1")])),
  885:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  886:   ok.

  888: escaped_character(_Config) ->

  891:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  892:   Expected = expected(p([~"Here *not bold* and `not code` and _means_nothing_ ",
  893:                         inline_code(~"`test`")])),
  894:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  895:   ok.

  992: multiline_bullet_indented_list(_Config) ->
  993:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  994:              ~"  * One liner\n  * Second line"),
  995:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  996:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(~"One liner")), li(p(~"Second line"))])]),
  997:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  998:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  999:     ok.
 1000: 
 1001: multiline_bullet_indented_list2(_Config) ->
 1002:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
 1003:              ~"  * _One liner_\n  * _Second_ `line`"),
 1004:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1005:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(it(~"One liner"))),
 1006:                              li(p([it(~"Second"), ~" ",  inline_code(~"line")]))])]),
 1007:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1008:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1009:     ok.

 1040: complex_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->

 1043:     Expected = expected([ul([
 1044:                              li([ p(~"One liner"),
 1045:                                   ul([ li(p(~"First nested line")) ])
 1046:                                 ]),
 1047:                              li([p(~"Second line")])
 1048:                             ])]),
 1049:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1050:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1051:     ok.
 1052: 
 1053: complex_nested_bullet_list2(_Config) ->
 1054:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"
 1055: * One liner
 1056:   * First nested line
 1057:     * Second level nested line
 1058:   * Second nested line
 1059:     * Another nested line
 1060: * Second one liner"),
 1061:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1062:     Expected = expected([ul([
 1063:                              li([ p(~"One liner"),
 1064:                                   ul([ li([
 1065:                                            p(~"First nested line"),
 1066:                                            ul([ li([p(~"Second level nested line")])])
 1067:                                           ]),
 1068:                                        li([
 1069:                                            p(~"Second nested line"),
 1070:                                            ul([ li([p(~"Another nested line")])])
 1071:                                           ])
 1072:                                      ])
 1073:                                 ]),
 1074:                              li([ p(~"Second one liner")])
 1075:                             ])]),
 1076:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1077:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1078:     ok.

 1080: complex_nested_bullet_list3(_Config) ->
 1081:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"
 1082: - Optional: one or more _User's private key(s)_ in case of `publickey`
 1083:   authorization. The default files are
 1084:   - `id_dsa` and `id_dsa.pub`
 1085:   - `id_rsa` and `id_rsa.pub`
 1086:   - `id_ecdsa` and `id_ecdsa.pub`
 1087: "),
 1088:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1089:     Expected = expected([ul([ li([p([~"Optional: one or more ",
 1090:                                    it(~"User's private key(s)"),
 1091:                                    ~" in case of ",
 1092:                                    inline_code(~"publickey"),
 1093:                                    ~" authorization. The default files are"]),
 1094:                                   ul([ li( [p([inline_code(~"id_dsa"),
 1095:                                                ~" and ",
 1096:                                                inline_code(~"id_dsa.pub")])]),
 1097:                                        li( [p([inline_code(~"id_rsa"),
 1098:                                                ~" and ",
 1099:                                                inline_code(~"id_rsa.pub")])]),
 1100:                                        li( [p([inline_code(~"id_ecdsa"),
 1101:                                                ~" and ",
 1102:                                                inline_code(~"id_ecdsa.pub")])])])])])]),
 1103:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1104:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1105:     ok.

 1107: bullet_list_mix_with_number_list(_Config) ->
 1108:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"* Bullet list\n1. Numbered list"),
 1109:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1110:     Expected = expected([ul([li([ p(~"Bullet list")])]),
 1111:                          ol([li([ p(~"Numbered list")])])]),
 1112:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1113:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1114:     ok.

 1116: inline_code_list(_Config) ->
 1117:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"""
 1118: * ```
 1119:   Code block
 1120:     More code
 1121:   ```
 1122:   {: .class }
 1123: """),
 1124:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1125:     Expected = expected([ul([li([ code(~"Code block\n  More code\n")])])]),
 1126:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1127:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1128:     ok.
 1129: 
 1130: %% this example could render the last line within the inner ul.
 1131: %% the end result looks exactly the same, and the fix is non-trivial.
 1132: bullet_list_with_anchor(_Config) ->
 1133:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(~"""
 1134: - **`+c true | false`**{: #+c } - Enables or disables
 1135:   [time correction](time_correction.md#time-correction):
 1136: 
 1137:   - **`true`** - Enables time correction.
 1138:   - another example
 1139: 
 1140:   - **`false`** - Disables time correction.
 1141: """),
 1142:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1143:     Expected = expected([ul([li([ p([em(inline_code(~"+c true | false")),
 1144:                                     ~" - Enables or disables time correction:"]),
 1145:                                   ul([li([ p([ em(inline_code(~"true")), ~" - Enables time correction."])]),
 1146:                                       li([ p(~"another example")])]),
 1147:                                   ul([li(p([ em(inline_code(~"false")), ~" - Disables time correction."]))])])])]),
 1148:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1149:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1150:     ok.
 1151:

 1161: singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->

 1167:     ok.

 1172:     Expected = expected([ol([li([p([~"One liner This is a new paragraph"])])])]),
 1173:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

 1175:     ok.

 1191:     ok.

 1249: table_with_rows(_Config) ->
 1250:     Table = ~"""
 1251: | H1 | H2 | H3 |
 1252: |:-----|:--:|----|
 1253: |D1   | D2 | D3 |
 1254: """,
 1255:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(Table),
 1256:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1257:     Expected = expected([table([~"| H1 | H2 | H3 |\n",
 1258:                                 ~"|:-----|:--:|----|\n",
 1259:                                 ~"|D1   | D2 | D3 |\n"])]),
 1260:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1261:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1262:     ok.
 1263: 
 1264: table_with_escaped_bars(_Config) ->
 1265:   Table = ~"""
 1266: | **JSON** | **Erlang**             |
 1267: |----------|------------------------|
 1268: | Number   | `integer() \| float()` |
 1269: """,
 1270:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(Table),
 1271:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1272:     Expected = expected([table([~"| **JSON** | **Erlang**             |\n",
 1273:                                 ~"|----------|------------------------|\n",
 1274:                                 ~"| Number   | `integer() \\| float()` |\n"])]),
 1275:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1276:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1277:     ok.
 1278: 
 1279: fake_table_test(_Config) ->
 1280:   NotTable = ~"""
 1281: | **JSON** | **Erlang**
 1282: """,
 1283:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(NotTable),
 1284:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
 1285:     Expected = expected([p([~"| ", em(~"JSON"), ~" | ", em(~"Erlang")])]),
 1286:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
 1287:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
 1288:     ok.
 1289: 
 1290: header(Level, Text) when is_integer(Level) ->
 1291:     HeadingLevel = integer_to_list(Level),
 1292:     HeadingLevelAtom = list_to_existing_atom("h" ++ HeadingLevel),
 1293:     {HeadingLevelAtom, [], [Text]}.
 1294: 
 1295: code(X) ->
 1296:     {pre,[],[inline_code(X)]}.
 1297: 
 1298: table(Table) when is_list(Table) ->
 1299:     {pre,[], [inline_code(Table)]}.
 1300: 
 1301: inline_code(X) when is_list(X) ->
 1302:     {code,[],X};
 1303: inline_code(X) ->
 1304:     {code,[],[X]}.
 1305: 
 1306: p(X) when is_list(X) ->
 1307:     {p, [], X};
 1308: p(X) when is_tuple(X); is_binary(X) ->
 1309:     p([X]).
 1310: 
 1311: blockquote(X) when is_list(X) ->
 1312:   {blockquote, [], X};
 1313: blockquote(Tuple) when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
 1314:     {blockquote, [], [Tuple]}.
 1315: 
 1316: em(X) when is_list(X) ->
 1317:     {em, [], X};
 1318: em(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
 1319:     em([X]).
 1320: 
 1321: it(X) when is_list(X) ->
 1322:     {i, [], X};
 1323: it(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
 1324:     it([X]).
 1325: 
 1326: ul(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
 1327:     {ul, [], Items}.
 1328: 
 1329: ol(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
 1330:     {ol, [], Items}.
 1331: 
 1332: li(Item) when is_tuple(Item); is_binary(Item) ->
 1333:     li([Item]);
 1334: li(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
 1335:     {li, [], Items}.
 1336: 
 1337: -spec create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) -> #docs_v1{} when
 1338:       Language  :: atom(),
 1339:       Mime      :: binary(),
 1340:       ModuleDoc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
 1341:       Metadata  :: map(),
 1342:       Docs      :: [{{Kind, Name, Arity},
 1343:                      Anno :: erl_anno:anno(),
 1344:                      Signature :: [binary()],
 1345:                      Doc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
 1346:                      Metadata :: map()
 1347:                     }],
 1348:       Kind      :: function | type | callback,
 1349:       Name      :: atom(),
 1350:       Arity     :: non_neg_integer(),
 1351:       DocLanguage :: binary(),
 1352:       DocValue :: binary() | term().
 1353: create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) ->
 1354:     #docs_v1{anno = [],
 1355:              beam_language = Language,
 1356:              format = Mime,
 1357:              module_doc = ModuleDoc,
 1358:              metadata = maps:merge(#{ otp_doc_vsn => ?CURR_DOC_VERSION }, Metadata),
 1359:              docs = Docs}.
 1360: 
 1361: extract_moduledoc(Docs) ->
 1362:     Docs#docs_v1.module_doc.
 1363: 
 1364: extract_doc(Docs) ->
 1365:     Docs#docs_v1.docs.
 1366: 
 1367: extract_format(Docs) ->
 1368:     Docs#docs_v1.format.
 1369: 
 1370: create_eep48_doc(Doc) when is_binary(Doc) ->
 1371:     create_eep48_doc(Doc, ~"application/erlang+html").
 1372: 
 1373: create_eep48_doc(Doc, Format) when is_binary(Doc) ->
 1374:     Docs = #{~"en" => shell_docs_markdown:parse_md(Doc)},
 1375:     create_eep48(erlang, Format, Docs, #{}, create_fun(Docs)).
 1376: 
 1377: create_fun(Docs) ->
 1378:     [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Docs, #{}}].
 1379: 
 1380: 
 1381: expected(X) when is_list(X)->
 1382:     #{~"en" => X};
 1383: expected(X) when is_tuple(X) ->
 1384:     expected([X]).
 1385: 
 1386: compile(Docs) ->
 1387:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
 1388:     ?NATIVE_FORMAT = extract_format(Docs),
 1389:     Docs.
